Comments_List: This course helps me know more about numerical analysis, SVD, and other techniques, coding skills (Python), knowledge in computational mathematics.
I learned about how a computer thinks about math .
Lots of interesting things, such as SVD.

Strengths: This course is opened for the first time, and very organized, and helps students have an overview of computational mathematics.
Weakness: The syllabus is not very clear. Although it says familiar with any programming language is enough, it's not true; proficient with C and Python is very necessary. The homework is given every month and workload is high, perhaps divided into each week with small workload will be better.
can be stricter in homework assignment and projects, for example, all homework problems are complementary
I highly recommend this course. Since this course will really challenge you in every perspective, it will also help you decide what you want to do.
Yes! It is great if you are a data scientist but want to learn more about whats actually going on inside the computer.

Yes.
The instructor is very nice and you can talk to him with any question you have
